PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-00402022-01-28PMO,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisOrder directing that a COMMISSION do issue under the Great Seal of Canada empowering any person appointed as Deputy Clerk of the Privy Council and Associate Secretary to the Cabinet, including NATHALIE G. DROUIN, the current holder of that office, to administer, to any person who holds or is authorized to hold office, or who may be appointed to discharge any duty, on behalf of the Government of Canada, the Oath of Allegiance and the Oath of Office, and any other oath as may from time to time be prescribed by law, and to have that power during their tenure of office.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order directing that a COMMISSION do issue under the Great Seal of Canada empowering any person appointed as Deputy Clerk of the Privy Council and Associate Secretary to the Cabinet, including NATHALIE G. DROUIN, the current holder of that office, to administer, to any person who holds or is authorized to hold office, or who may be appointed to discharge any duty, on behalf of the Government of Canada, the Oath of Allegiance and the Oath of Office, and any other oath as may from time to time be prescribed by law, and to have that power during their tenure of office.
